alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stone, east central Van Buren and northwestern Cleburne Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shirley, or near Fairfield Bay, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Fairfield Bay... Shirley... Ben... Parma... Hanover... Prim... Rushing... Turkey Creek... Luber... Brewer... Woodrow... Edgemont... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
